topic.title: Voice Menu
topic.shortdesc: TA1600/2400/3200 provides a voice menu to guide you to configure the network settings for the device.

body.p:
You need to press *** on the analog phone which is connected to TA1600/2400/3200â€™s FXS port to enter the voice menu.
Press 9 to listen to the prompt again.
Press * to return to the last menu.
The default password to enter Advanced Settings is 123456. You can go to Gateway Gateway Settings Feature Codes Voice Menu Password Settings to change the password.
